DOC.brief_summary: This clinical study evaluate efficacy lateral wedge insole subtalar strap knee osteoarthritis treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Lateral Wedge Insole With Subtalar Strapping Knee Osteoarthritis
DOC.detailed_description: The objective study evaluate efficacy lateral wedge insole subtalar strap knee osteoarthritis treatment . Fifty-eight patient knee osteoarthritis randomize use either lateral wedge neutral insole . VAS , Western Ontario McMaster Universities Osteoarthritis Index ( WOMAC ) Lequesne questionnaires apply baseline , week two , eight , 24 .
DOC.criteria: Meet American College Rheumatology criterion knee Osteoarthritis Varus malalignment knee Absence previous fracture index knee Absence previous surgery index knee Absence Rheumatoid Arthritis No Intraarticular injection index knee past 6 month Receiving usual care Osteoarthritis least 6 month Be able understand agree inform consent Undergo surgery study Undergo Intraarticular injection study Develop articular infection index joint study
